room_title: Escape room "The Tomb" by Deadbolt Escape Rooms in Tupelo
room_address: 1186 Cliff Gookin Blvd Suite B Tupelo, MS 38801
room_description:
You and your group of adventure seekers have decided to explore the old cemetery at midnight. But you arenâ€™t alone... Something has been waiting for you amongst the graves. Shrouded in shadows, it chases you to the largest crypt in the graveyard: the final resting place for a family of world-renowned monster hunters.
You find yourselves trapped in a mausoleum, hunted by a creature of the dark. The only bright spot in this dismal situation: there is much to be learned about monsters and monster-hunting inside the crypt if only you know where to look. Discover the nature of the fiend that is stalking you, discover how to eliminate the threat, and find your way out of the tomb before it is too late.
